title: Quarkus Extension for Spring Cache API
summary: The document guide provides information on how to integrate and use the Spring Cache API within a Quarkus application. It details prerequisites such as familiarity with Spring DI and outlines steps to create a Maven project integrated with `spring-cache` and `spring-di` extensions. Essential for developers needing to leverage Spring Cache annotations in Quarkus for data caching in Spring beans. Additionally, it demonstrates how to enable caching, discusses supported cache-related annotations, and informs about future support for more comprehensive features of these annotations.
